India's chase was then comfortably navigated, ensuring a seven-wicket victory.

Both parties have filed complaints, and police are investigating.

AI models: Oracle founder lists 2 types, says Musk’s Tesla uses ‘low-latency’
description: Oracle founder Larry Ellison distinguished between two AI model types: those requiring real-time, low-latency decisions for applications like self-driving cars and robotics, and those where delays are acceptable, such as chatbots. He highlighted Tesla's use of local compute for immediate responses, emphasizing that both categories are crucial for AI's future.

title: Coding shaken by AI: Eric Schmidt sounds alarm; warns 'could be end for coders like me'
description: Former Google CEO Eric Schmidt expressed shock at AI's rapid advancement, admitting his own obsolescence after witnessing an AI autonomously generate a program. He believes AI's biggest impact lies in automating business operations, not just coding, and predicts artificial general intelligence could arrive by 2029, urging human oversight to preserve agency.

title: NHL Update: Connor McDavid reacts to Oilers trading Skinner, Kulak
description: The Edmonton Oilers made a significant roster change, trading goalie Stuart Skinner and defenseman Brett Kulak to the Pittsburgh Penguins for Tristan Jarry and Spencer Stastney. While the move addressed goaltending needs, it was acknowledged as a difficult decision by players like Connor McDavid and Head Coach Kris Knoblauch, who praised the departing players' contributions.

title: How much is Rey Mysterio and Angie Gutierrez's combined net worth? Income, assets & more
description: Rey Mysterio and Angie Gutierrez have amassed an estimated $11 million net worth by 2025, primarily from Rey's successful wrestling career and business ventures.  His WWE earnings, merchandise sales, and Angie's entrepreneurial pursuits contribute to their comfortable lifestyle in California, supported by wise investments and smart financial planning.

title: Tom Brady breaks silence with powerful message as John Cena enters final match
description: Wrestling icon John Cena is preparing for his final match. NFL legend Tom Brady sent a message acknowledging Cena's significant influence. Brady's words focused on the lives Cena touched, both inside and outside the wrestling ring. This recognition goes beyond titles and scripted moments. It celebrates Cena's consistency and accountability.

title: Connor McDavid’s wife, Lauren Kyle launches Sports Club Atelier collection
description: Lauren Kyle, wife of NHL star Connor McDavid, is launching a Canada-inspired collection for her brand, Sports Club Atelier, in January. Drawing inspiration from vintage winter advertising and alpine campaigns, the line features red-and-white pieces designed for fans to express patriotic pride fashionably at sporting events and in everyday life.
